title: Spirit HD v1.5.9 Android
description:
Spirit v1.5.9 Proper Cracked
Requirements: Android 2.1+
Overview: Spirit, by Marco Mazzoli. The critically acclaimed iPhone hit now on Android!



Specially for the Android version: both Spirit and Spirit HD (tablet version) included in the same package. Buy once and play both versions of the game on your different devices.

Simple and fun to play. No shooting. No on-screen controls. Just slide your finger and Spirit will mimic your movements. 

Check out what people are saying about it:

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ "Spirit is a budget gem you donÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t want to miss" - TouchGen

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ "One of the best arcade-style apps on the App Store right now" - GameZebo

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ "The experience is incredibly fluid and seamless. It just feels right, and no amount of screen-shots can do it justice" - themacfeed.com

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ "Hypnotic, compelling stuff" - The Sunday Times

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ "Slick control scheme meets fantastic visual effects and sound design; this is the complete arcade package" - Games Uncovered 

Take control of Spirit in an intense retro inspired arcade experience, reinvented for Android devices.

Guide Spirit against many different enemy types, and distort space to force them into another dimension.

Features a fluid, easy to play yet hard to master control system. Relative movement allows you to keep your finger out of the way of the action.

Combine links and combos to build up huge scores. Fight your way through increasingly challenging waves, uniquely generated for each game.

App2SD supported. 

Recent changes:
1.5.9:

* Attempt to workaround issue with market app saying game is incompatible with devices that it is compatible with
* Use 24-bit colour on SGS2 and other devices
* If you are having keyboard issue, please enable "Use Name Dialog" in Options menu.

Release note:
playable on flight mode.
fix scores issue.
Cracked by ChelpuS
